Name: Peacock Coin
Description: PeacockCoin is a deflationary yield token on the Binance Smart Chain with multi-dimensional NFT's. PeacockCoin wants to facilitate influential, pioneering contemporary, digital, and crypto native artists' work.Peacock Coin (PEKC) is designed to rewards holders. The PeacockCoin tokenomics apply a special tax to every buyer or seller: 2,5% are redistributed back to holders while 2,5% are burned forever reducing the total supply.
